name: UTA☆PRI ISLAND
description:
*UTA☆PRI ISLAND (うた☆プリアイランド Uta☆Pri Airando) was a smartphone application launched by Broccoli as part of the Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ franchise. It was available for iPhone and Android smartphones from December 2014 to March 31st, 2016.

(*Source of Description - Uta no Prince-sama Wiki; 'UTA☆PRI ISLAND')
